line.text: %BladeSimple%: How in blazes did I get here...and speakin' of that, where is here?

response.text: %PLAYER%: This is Murderworld. You must have been brought here by Arcade.

line.text: %BladeSimple%: What would a loser like Arcade want with me?

response.text: %PLAYER%: I don't know, but he must have done it on Dr. Doom's orders. Doom's formed a group of villains known as the Masters of Evil.

line.text: %BladeSimple%: Doom, eh? Any idea what he's up to?

response.text: %PLAYER%: We don't know exactly what he has planned, but it's gonna be big. He's stolen a couple of S.H.I.E.L.D. experiments, including the new Super Soldier Serum.

line.text: %BladeSimple%: Now this is starting to sound interesting. Tell you what, I'm joining the team. If you need me, just let me know, cause there's nothing I'd rather do than take down Victor Von Doom.
